creator: Cloak
descriptionHtml:
Cloak provides simple, password-free file encryption.

Cloak supports sign in with your Google, Apple, Facebook, Dropbox or Box ID. If your team likes it, it is easy for your organization to enable its staff to sign on to Cloak Apps using their Windows Active Directory or LDAP accounts, through our Cloak Gateway.

Cloak (encrypt) your files, so that you can safely store or share them on the cloud or via email. Only your authorized recipients will be able to uncloak (decrypt) the files. With our key management services, there are no file passwords to send to recipients.

It also works out of the box across major platforms. This product is free to use and is not plagued by advertisements. As a privacy protection tool, it only asks for minimum permissions on your device.

Advanced security specifications:

1.Encryption:
a. Client-end encryption
b. Client-end key generation
c. Unique cryptographic key for each user
d. AES encryption (256 bit)
e. RSA encryption (2048 bit)

2. Single Sign-On (Google, Apple, Facebook, Dropbox, Box)

3. Enterprise Single Sign-On (Active Directory, LDAP through *Cloak Gateway)

4. Multi-Factor Authentication (with *Cloak Gateway)

5. User Key Control (with *Cloak Gateway)

6. Key Management Tools for:
a. Lost certificate recovery
b. Endpoint revocation
c. User revocation

7. Sharing
a. No file password required
b. Pre-defined sharing list
c. Owner notification and approval of file access requests


* Cloak Gateway is a paid service. Kindly contact us for a quotation.
descriptionShort: Cloak your files for a safer tomorrow!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Cloak Encrypt now supports:
a) Integration with Cloak web application (https://www.cloakapps.com) to provide installation-free, login-free file encryption over popular web browsers.
b) Company users and groups to quickly share files to your organization teams.
c) Single-Sign-On using Cloak Gateway with Active Directory or LDAP, for easy user on-boarding and off-boarding.
d) User key storage on your Cloak Gateway, to achieve private key control.

descriptionShort: Cloak your files for a safer tomorrow!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Cloak Encrypt now includes a secure chat, to easily share cloaked files to your recipients. Cloak, Share and Chat!

Our advanced file encryption features:
a) Integration with Cloak web application (https://www.cloakapps.com) to provide installation-free, login-free file encryption over popular web browsers.
b) Single-Sign-On and user-controlled key storage using Cloak Gateway with Active Directory or LDAP, for easy user on-boarding and off-boarding.
c) Pre-defined company users and groups.

3. Enterprise Single Sign-On (Active Directory, LDAP through *Cloak Gateway)

4. Multi-Factor Authentication (with *Cloak Gateway)

5. User Key Control (with *Cloak Gateway)

6. Key Management Tools for:
a. Lost certificate recovery
b. Endpoint revocation
c. User revocation

7. Sharing
a. No file password required
b. Pre-defined sharing list
c. Owner notification and approval of file access requests


* Cloak Gateway is a paid service. Kindly contact us for a quotation.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Cloak Encrypt now includes a secure chat, to easily share cloaked files to your recipients. Cloak, Share and Chat!

Our advanced file encryption features:
a) Integration with Cloak web application (https://www.cloakapps.com) to provide installation-free, login-free file encryption over popular web browsers.
b) Single-Sign-On and user-controlled key storage using Cloak Gateway with Active Directory or LDAP.
c) Pre-defined company users and groups.
d) Support for X509, ECC and RSA certificates.

title: Cloak Encrypt

creator: Cloak
descriptionHtml:
Cloak provides simple, password-free file encryption.

Cloak supports sign in with your Google, Apple, Facebook, Dropbox or Box ID. If your team likes it, it is easy for your organization to enable its staff to sign on to Cloak Apps using their Windows Active Directory or LDAP accounts, through our Cloak Gateway.

Cloak (encrypt) your files, so that you can safely store or share them on the cloud or via email. Only your authorized recipients will be able to uncloak (decrypt) the files. With our key management services, there are no file passwords to send to recipients.

It also works out of the box across major platforms. This product is free to use and is not plagued by advertisements. As a privacy protection tool, it only asks for minimum permissions on your device.

Advanced security specifications:

1.Encryption:
a. Client-end encryption
b. Client-end key generation
c. Unique cryptographic key for each user
d. AES encryption (256 bit)
e. RSA encryption (2048 bit)

2. Single Sign-On (Google, Apple, Facebook, Dropbox, Box)

3. Enterprise Single Sign-On (Active Directory, LDAP through *Cloak Gateway)

4. Multi-Factor Authentication (with *Cloak Gateway)

5. User Key Control (with *Cloak Gateway)

6. Key Management Tools for:
a. Lost certificate recovery
b. Endpoint revocation
c. User revocation

7. Sharing
a. No file password required
b. Pre-defined sharing list
c. Owner notification and approval of file access requests


* Cloak Gateway is a paid service. Kindly contact us for a quotation.

Cloak Encrypt now includes a secure chat, to easily share cloaked files to your recipients. Cloak, Share and Chat!

b) Single-Sign-On and user-controlled key storage using Cloak Gateway with Active Directory or LDAP.
c) Pre-defined company users and groups.
d) Support for X509, ECC and RSA certificates.
